ygData.subject: Re: [EQ_Tinkering] Sigh...  Abashi responds...
ygData.msgSnippet: ... To be fair, he never did say what you attributed to him. You said that he said the tinkering would be done NEXT after poisoning. This is incorrect. All he
ygData.messageBody:
On Wed, Aug 30, 2000 at 02:50:45PM -0700, Gazamel Prime wrote:
> I started up a thread on the Gameplay boards, and
> Abashi actually answered it. He is now saying that
> Tinkering was never promised to us after poison, a
> 100% contradiction of what Aradune stated earlier this
> year.

To be fair, he never did say what you attributed to him.

You said that he said the tinkering would be done NEXT after poisoning.

This is incorrect.

All he said was that it would be done after poisoning, not IMMEDIATELY after
poisoning.

Be patient. They'll get to it.

Pasketti of Povar
